column5: I made a post earlier about my brother fighting tonight in Lethbridge, AB.  I just got a call from LEthbridge and he won by armbar at 3:16 of round 1.  I'll update this when I get more info and/or pics.  For now, here's the pic from the weigh in last night
Congrad to your brother! I have always been very fasinated with MMA, complex techniques, and powerful shots!
right on! the leafs and raptors can't do it, hopefully your brother can continue to rack up some w's
right on good to hear he won!!!  cheers!
